mso-font-kerning:0pt">本文经「原理」（微信公众号：<span lang="EN-US">principia1687</span>）授权转载，禁止二次转载</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">什么是登纳德缩放比例定律？为什么芯片里总有那么一部分甚至一大部分是不能同时工作的？那为什么我们还要费尽心思往集成电路里加更多的晶体管呢？暗硅又是一种怎样概念？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在上一期的计算机文化系列文章中我们从工程方面讨论了计算机的极限，并由此引出了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzA4NDU1MDY5OA==&mid=2653187803&idx=1&sn=2fb22f9fb17254ff46cc67a2d230f6d3&chksm=8435bb9eb3423288363d6b2c06b18771241e922f4aed95d746d8d65d84b33c055ed0147eefde&scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#4395F5">摩尔定律</span></a></span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">。这一期，我们将从<b>功耗</b>的角度来进一步探讨计算机所面临的极限。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">早在<span lang="EN-US">1971</span>年，英特尔推出了首个商用，速度仅有<span lang="EN-US">740kHz</span>的计算机芯片<span lang="EN-US">Intel-4004</span>。在此之后，芯片速度得到了迅速的发展，在不到<span lang="EN-US">30</span>年后的<span lang="EN-US">2000</span>年就已经突破了<span lang="EN-US">2GHz</span>，达到了近<span lang="EN-US">3000</span>倍的增长。然而<span lang="EN-US">2000</span>年似乎成为了芯片发展速度的一个坎，直到如今市场上多数处理器也在<span lang="EN-US">3GHz</span>左右徘徊。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">△<span lang="EN-US"> Intel C4004</span>微处理器。（图片来源：<span lang="EN-US">Wikipedia</span>）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2001</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年<span lang="EN-US">IBM</span>首先制造出了世界上第一个</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:0pt">双核处理器</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，<b>使得两个低速度、低功耗的处理器能在性能方面与当下的单个高速度的处理器相匹敌</b>，并由此开辟了并行化体系结构的市场。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2004</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年，在<span lang="EN-US">AMD</span>发布了其第一个双核处理器之后，英特尔更是宣布取消其对<span lang="EN-US">4GHz </span>处理器的研究，与当时一众同行一起投入到了多核处理器的研发当中。由此，<b>计算机芯片的发展从之前的更高速的单核研究转变到了同等甚至更低速的多核研究。</b>究其原因，主要来自于<b>更高速的处理器的功耗和散热已经达到了不可忽视的地步。</b><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2013</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年，<span lang="EN-US">ITRS </span>在第二次修正了摩尔定律的同年发表评论，将功耗列为了计算机发展的主要挑战。那么这个挑战从何而来呢？为什么在如此迅速发展之后突然遇到了门槛呢？这就不得不提到芯片行业发展的又一个定律——</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#407600;mso-font-kerning:0pt">登纳德缩放比例</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（<span lang="EN-US">Dennard
Scaling</span>）</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在了解登纳德缩放比例定律之前，我们先来看看</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">晶体管的功耗是如何计算的</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。晶体管的功耗大体分为两类：一类是</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#0052FF;mso-font-kerning:0pt">静态功耗</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，一类是</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7A4FD6;mso-font-kerning:0pt">动态功耗</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。静态功耗的计算比较好理解，就是</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#0052FF;mso-font-kerning:0pt">常规的电压乘以电流</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。而</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7A4FD6;mso-font-kerning:0pt">晶体管在做<span lang="EN-US"> 1 </span>和<span lang="EN-US"> 0 </span>的相互转换时会根据转换频率的高低产生不同大小的功耗</span><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">， 我们把这个功耗叫做动态功耗，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7A4FD6;mso-font-kerning:0pt">与电压的平方以及频率成正比</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">△<span lang="EN-US"> </span>罗伯特登纳德在<span lang="EN-US">1974</span>年发表的论文。（图片来源：<span lang="EN-US">Robert Dennard</span>）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1974</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年，也就是高登摩尔第一次修正摩尔定律的前一年，罗伯特登纳德在发表的论文
“<span lang="EN-US">Design of ion-implanted MOSFETS with very small physical
dimensions</span>”</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">[1]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中表示，<b>晶体管面积的缩小使得其所消耗的电压以及电流会以差不多相同的比例缩小</b>。也就是说，<b>如果晶体管的大小减半，该晶体管的静态功耗将会降至四分之一</b>（电压电流同时减半）。芯片业的发展目标基本上是在保证功耗不变的情况下尽可能提高性能。那么根据登纳德缩放比例，设计者可以大大地提高芯片的时钟频率，因为提高频率所带来的更多的动态功耗会和减小的静态功耗相抵消。于是，登纳德缩放比例定律同摩尔定律一起引领了芯片行业<span lang="EN-US">30</span>多年的飞速发展。因为在往同面积电路中集成更多晶体管的时候，提高芯片时钟频率成为了一个“免费的午餐”。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事情发展到<span lang="EN-US">2005</span>年前后。在摩尔定律的指导下当晶体管的大小越做越小时，</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:0pt">量子隧穿效应</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（指像电子等微观粒子能够穿入或穿越位势垒的量子行为）</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">开始慢慢介入，使得晶体管<b>漏电现象</b>开始出现。<b>漏电现象的出现打破了原先登纳德所提出的定律，使得晶体管在往更小工艺制作时候的静态功耗不减反增，同时也带来了很大的热能转换，使得芯片的散热成为了急需解决的问题。</b>如果散热做的不好，芯片的寿命将大大减少甚至变得不稳定。在这种情况下，提高芯片的时钟频率不再是免费的午餐。相反，在没有解决晶体管漏电的问题之前，单纯的增加芯片的时钟频率因为随之而来的散热问题而变得不再现实。毕竟没人希望今后需要通过不停的往自家电脑主机里灌水来散热。于是芯片研究商们开始纷纷停止高频芯片的研发，转而<b>向低频多核的架构开始研究</b>。这才有了从<span lang="EN-US">2001</span>年开始的第一个双核芯片到现在普遍家用电脑的<span lang="EN-US">4</span>核芯片，再到如今英特尔最新架构<span lang="EN-US">KnightLanding</span>上的<span lang="EN-US">64</span>核的发展。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然而<b>从单核向多核的发展并没有从根本上解决问题</b>。因为芯片研发商仅仅是停止了高频单核的研发，但并未停止往同面积的集成电路内加入更多的晶体管。不然就不会有从双核到四核再到八核的发展了。那么正如之前所提到的，在登纳德缩放比例不再适用，在晶体管越做越小并因晶体管漏电而导致芯片发热越来越严重的今天，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#AB1942;mso-font-kerning:0pt">芯片制造商们又是如何解决功耗以及散热的问题呢？</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">答案是，<b>没有解决！</b>可能你引以为傲，刚买的八核处理器只不过是一个摆设。要解释这个问题，就需要了解</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:0pt">暗硅</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这个概念。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">暗硅这个概念是在<span lang="EN-US">2011</span>年在计算机体系结构会议<span lang="EN-US">ISCA</span>中首次提出的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[2]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。作者发现在后登纳德时代，<b>为了在现有的散热技术上保证芯片不至于过热以及功耗不至于过大，如今多核芯片中已经有一部分不能和其余部分同时使用。</b>举个简单的例子，对于一个<span lang="EN-US">65</span>纳米下的<span lang="EN-US">4</span>核处理器，假如额定功耗允许其四个核能够同时全速工作。当工艺缩小到<span lang="EN-US">32</span>纳米的时候，等面积的处理器现在能容下<span lang="EN-US">16</span>核了，但是能够同时工作的还是只有四个核。而<b>这块不能和其他部分同时使用的<span lang="EN-US">12</span>个核就称为暗硅</b>。<span lang="EN-US">Igor Markov </span>在论文 “<span lang="EN-US">Limits on fundamental limits to computation</span>” 中提到，按照如今的发展速度，现代处理器的暗硅部分很快就能大到<span lang="EN-US">99% </span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[3]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。也就是说，按照如今的发展，不久之后的芯片，即便是再牛，在同一时间能够利用的也只是<span lang="EN-US">1%</span>。加上越来越多核数的集成，内部连接所导致的的功耗也正在逐渐超过核内运算所导致的功耗。基于这个结果，微软和<span lang="EN-US">IBM</span>共同预测了<b>多核芯片研发在不久将来的终结</b></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[4]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">那么问题来了，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#AB1942;mso-font-kerning:0pt">既然芯片大部分会成为暗硅，那么芯片商为什么还要不断地往同面积的芯片里加入更多的核呢？为什么不通过把芯片直接做小来减少成本呢？</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先<b>芯片面积的成本根本不重要</b>。随着芯片越做越小，芯片的面积成本所占的比重越来越小，从而使得芯片成本不会因为芯片面积缩小而线性缩小。芯片的引脚和封装开始占设计成本越来越重要的部分。其次就是<b>商业原因</b>。尽管多出来的核数大多数都是暗硅，但八核处理器听起来就是比双核牛逼吧？就是容易在消费者心里留下更深的印象吧？而且通过一些程序和编译器的优化设计也确实有可能让更多的核在更低频的工作，从而达到系统性能的提升。至少八核处理器的潜力大过双核，特别是对一些特别任务的加速。虽然这些特殊的任务大部分用户在大部分时间里都不会遇到。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">那么面对这些问题，科学家们又是怎么应对的呢？在业界，<span lang="EN-US">ARM</span>率先提出了</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">异构系统架构</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">（<span lang="EN-US">big.LITTLE </span>以及前段时间刚发布的<span lang="EN-US">DynamlQ</span>），<b>在芯片里同时放入大核（高频）与小核（低频）</b>。核的利用根据所运行的程由操作系统决定，从而达到尽量减小功耗目的。在学术界，
洛夫兰道尔（<span lang="EN-US">Rolf Landauer) </span>在<span lang="EN-US">1961</span>年的论文中提出这样一个概念</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[5]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。因为擦掉一个比特的信息用于重写至少需要消耗<span lang="EN-US">kTln2</span>（<span lang="EN-US">k</span>是波尔兹曼常数，<span lang="EN-US">T</span>是温度）的能量，如果我们能建立一个计算模型，将每个输入产生的输出信号的能量保存起来，为新的信号输入提供能量，那我们<b>是否能创造出一个零热量产生的计算方式</b>。这种计算模型被称之为</span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#7B0C00;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可逆计算</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">兰道尔的想法的前半部分（即擦掉一个比特的信息用于重写至少需要消耗<span lang="EN-US">kTln2</span>的能量）<b>在<span lang="EN-US">2012</span>年在实验中得到了证实之后</b></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[6]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，可逆计算在学术界再次引起涟漪。虽然零热量产生的计算方式在海森堡不确定性原理的限制下被证明为不可能</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[7]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，科学家利用超导体材料将之前提到的擦掉<span lang="EN-US">1</span>比特信息所需要的能量减少到了<span lang="EN-US">kTln2</span>以下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[8]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。同时，科学家们也开始通过量子电路的设计来模拟可逆计算的计算模型，从而达到更小的计算功耗</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[9]</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。虽然这些研究还处于开始阶段，离实际应用还需要很长一段时间，但是众多科学家们对突破功耗极限的努力依然能让我们看到芯片发展的光明前途。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:6.0pt;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:6.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:21.0pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:white"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下期预告：</span></b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">为什么说多核芯片是人们在还没有准备好的情况下的一次摸着石头过河？系统并行化的极限在哪里？阿姆达尔定律又是什么呢？下期我们将从<b>时空概念</b>的角度继续探讨计算机的极限。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
